channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for KS

item.title: Report X-2023070963
item.description:
Report X-2023070963

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-09T18:14:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-11
  • City: OLATHE
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found leaking outside of a trailer and the load side manager gave this package to QA. QA then took this package to the Hazmat cage for processing. QA took cleaning supplies over to the cleanup and got everything cleaned up. DescribePack: Package failed due to one of the bottles being open or not on all the way. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: QA took this package to the hazmat cage and got it off the dock. QA also put down absorbable pads to soak up anything left behind.

item.title: Report X-2023061457
item.description:
Report X-2023061457

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-15T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-22
  • City: WICHITA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: UNLOADER NOTICED PACKAGE WITH SMALL LEAKAGE ON ONE CORNER AND CALLED RESPONDER. RESPONDER DISCOVERED CORRUGATED BOX WITH (3) 5QT MOTOR OIL INSIDE AN INNER BOX, ONE WITH A LOOSE LID. RESPONDER DISCOVERED (1) SMALL CEMENT BOTTLE WHICH WAS CRUSHED COMPLETELY.

item.title: Report X-2023061347
item.description:
Report X-2023061347

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-15T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-16
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SUPERVISOR RADIO DMP FOR A HAZARDOUS LEAKER. RESPONDER WAS DISPATCHED WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED AND USED THE DECISION TREE TO FIGURE OUT CORRECT RESPONSE MEASURE. RESPONDER FOLLOWED THE DECISION TREE AND CLEANED UP THE SPILL USING APPRIATE STEPS. RESPONDER BROUGHT THE LEAKER BACK TO THE DMP FOR DISPOSAL FOLLOWING THE CORRECT PROCEDURES.
